SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.dataset
Interface Address

public interface Address

Interface that provides address information.
Address information is obtained from locator information.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getEncodedAbsoluteURI()
          Absolute URI corresponding to URI in address information is obtained.
 java.lang.String getFragmentIdentifier()
          A fragment identifier is obtained.
 java.lang.String getURI()
          URI is obtained.
 java.lang.String getXBase()
          Basic URI is obtained.
 

Method Detail

getXBase

public java.lang.String getXBase()
Basic URI is obtained.
The system identifier of a basic URI, document, or entity specified with xml:base is obtained.
Returns:
Basic URI is returned.

getURI

public java.lang.String getURI()
URI is obtained.
A locator type element or simple type element URI specified with a specified href attribute is obtained.
An entire character string is returned when '#' is not contained in the href attribute value.
When '#' is contained in the href attribute value, a character string is returned as follows:
  • A empty string is returned when the href attribute value starts with '#'.
  • A character string preceding '#' is returned when the href attribute value does not start with '#'.
Returns:
URI.

getFragmentIdentifier

public java.lang.String getFragmentIdentifier()
A fragment identifier is obtained.
The fragment identifier of a locator type element or simple type element URI specified with the href attribute. If no fragment identifier is present in a character string specified as the href attribute value, a empty string is returned.
Returns:
Fragment identifier.

getEncodedAbsoluteURI

public java.lang.String getEncodedAbsoluteURI()
Absolute URI corresponding to URI in address information is obtained.
Absolute URI corresponding to a locator type element or simple type element URI specified with the href attribute is returned.
Returns:
Absolute URI.
